question: There are four pairs of devil fruits and their owners below. Which pair is incorrect?
answers: Yuki Yuki no Mi (Snow-Snow Fruit) and Monet
Kame Kame no Mi (Tortoise Fruit) and Pekoms
Bata Bata no Mi (Butter-Butter Fruit) and Charlotte Opera
Fude Fude no Mi (Brush-Brush Fruit) and Kurozumi Kanjuro
feedback: Kame Kame no Mi (Tortoise Fruit) and Pekoms
